title: Embedded Systems Engineering
description: In a team of four, design, development, and implementation of a software architecture on two Festo sorting systems with QNX (RTOS).
extra_description: Focus areas: Interrupt handling, Finite State Machines, Fail-Safe.

title: Computer Networks
description: Design and implementation of a TCP-based peer-to-peer application protocol with an overlay network.

title: Project Gamma
description: Machine learning model for predicting sales.

title: Project Delta
description: Mobile app with Flutter and Firebase backend.
